content:
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. I'm glad I could help you plan your road trip and provide you with some useful recommendations.

If you do need any more help or have any other questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Otherwise, I hope you have a fantastic road trip and enjoy all the amazing sights and experiences the Southwest and California have to offer!

Remember to take your time, drive safely, and soak up all the natural beauty and charm of the regions you'll be visiting. And don't forget to try some of the local cuisine and drinks along the way!

Safe travels, and happy adventuring!
